hero.bismillah: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
hero.verse: مَثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ أَنْبَتَتْ سَبْعَ سَنَابِلَ فِي كُلِّ سُنْبُلَةٍ مِائَةُ حَبَّةٍ وَاللَّهُ يُضَاعِفُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَاللَّهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ

charities.subtitle: Registered charity organizations on our platform

project1.title: Ramadan Food Campaign for Families in Rural Egypt.

project2.title: Medical Treatment Campaign for Those in Need

project4.title: Building a Mosque in a Remote Village

donationForm.title: Donate Now
donationForm.name: Name
donationForm.successMessage: Donation successful, thank you for your support

projects.title: Explore Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Browse all charity projects available for donation and support those in need
projects.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search criteria to find projects

hero.title: Together We Create a Better Future
hero.description: We are a leading charity organization dedicated to improving the lives of those in need across the world. Through our innovative projects and strategic partnerships, we make a lasting positive impact.

card.title: Our Impact
card.description: We're changing the lives of millions of people through our diverse projects

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.description: We are committed to improving the lives of those in need by providing sustainable humanitarian and development assistance.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where all individuals have dignity and equal opportunities to thrive regardless of their backgrounds or circumstances.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.goal1: Provide humanitarian and emergency relief assistance to people affected by crises and disasters.
goals.goal2: Implement sustainable development projects that address the root causes of poverty and empower local communities.
goals.goal3: Build strategic partnerships with local and international organizations to maximize impact and expand reach.

card.title: Beneficiaries
card.description: people benefited from our projects last year

values.title: Our Values & Principles
values.description: Our values reflect our commitment to transparency, integrity, compassion, and innovation in everything we do.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We act with honesty, ethics, and responsibility in all our dealings and decisions.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We provide our services with empathy and respect for the human dignity of beneficiaries.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We are committed to clarity and accountability in our use of resources and reporting.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek creative and sustainable solutions to challenges.

team.title: Management Team
team.description: Our team consists of a diverse group of experts who are specialized and committed to achieving our mission.

cta.title: Join Us on the Journey of Change
cta.description: You can contribute to making a real difference in the lives of those in need. Donate now or volunteer with us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We welcome your inquiries and feedback. You can reach us through any of the following channels.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: We're here to answer your questions and help with whatever you need. Feel free to reach out through any of the available channels.

card.title: Customer Service
card.description: Our team is ready to help and support

form.title: Send a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

location.title: Visit Our Office
location.description: We welcome you to visit our headquarters to learn more about our team and projects.

hours.title: Working Hours
hours.description: Our official working hours at the headquarters are from Sunday to Thursday.
hours.note: Please schedule an appointment for visits outside of official working hours.

map.title: Our Location
map.description: Visit us at our headquarters to learn more about our team and projects.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Our mission is to help those in need and make a positive impact on communities through charitable projects and initiatives.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates about our projects and initiatives.

donation.title: Support Our Cause
donation.description: Your donation can make a real difference in someone's life.
